review: This only works with my phone, not my laptop or computer. It only works with my phone half the time, so most of the time I'm so frustrated by it, I just end up watching on my tablet instead. Total bummer.
author: jess

review: Has a major problems with set up and even once running,  I find it annoying that I have to stream off my phone.  I highly prefer my Fire TV Stick! The Chromecast lives in a drawer.
author: snowfire555

review: works well--no problems with my Samsung TV
author: Ron Barrett

review: Terrible item. This chrome cast won't register and keep stopping in the middle of the movie.
author: Pen Name

review: Use it all the time with my phone and my laptop to view YouTube and Show box videos.
author: Armed Pastor

review: It is the perfect complement to my Nexus devices. I can share the screen on my TV. It is small and easy to set up.
author: David Flores
